name: PaymentAdjustmentInformation
title: paymentAdjustmentInformation
description: Code system of concepts specifying any payment adjustment due to drugs or medical devices.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the GP2 segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0468 (Payment Adjustment Code)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.display: Designated current drug or biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator G)
concept.definition: Designated current drug or biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator G)

concept.display: Designated new device payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator H)
concept.definition: Designated new device payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator H)

concept.display: Designated new drug or new biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator J)
concept.definition: Designated new drug or new biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator J)

concept.display: Deductible not applicable (specific list of HCPCS codes)
concept.definition: Deductible not applicable (specific list of HCPCS codes)
